male.name: eyewear
male.title: Round Frames
male.desc: Round frames can soften the angles of a square face, adding a touch of contrast and balance.

male.name: hairstyle
male.title: Textured Quiff
male.desc: A textured quiff with volume on top can help elongate the face and soften the strong jawline.

male.name: beardstyle
male.title: Light Stubble
male.desc: Light stubble can help soften the angles of a square jawline, creating a more balanced look.

male.name: cap
male.title: Beanie
male.desc: A beanie with a slightly slouchy fit can add some softness to the angles of a square face.

female.name: eyewear
female.title: Oval Frames
female.desc: Oval frames can add a soft contrast to the strong angles of a square face, creating a more balanced look.

female.name: hairstyle
female.title: Soft Layers
female.desc: Soft layers can help soften the angles of a square face, creating a more feminine and balanced look.

female.name: makeup
female.title: Soft Contouring
female.desc: Soft contouring can help add subtle definition to the angles of a square face, creating a more sculpted look.

female.name: earrings
female.title: Hoop Earrings
female.desc: Hoop earrings can add a touch of softness and femininity to a square face, complementing its angles.
